nodeType.description: The node (entity) type the returned Tags can be applied to

type.description: The type of the Tag returned. `CORE` tags are 'core' to classifying the entity within the Data Model, while `OPTIONAL` tags supply extra information about the classified entity and do not affect the classification

classId.description: The unique identifier of the Point or Equip Class the returned Tags must be associated with. Set to `"NONE"` to retrieve Tags that are not associated with any class.
